Class HammingDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • HammingDistance
  • public class HammingDistance
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains a file with Station IDs that is used in calculations of hamming distance between stations
    Author:
    Munn

    • Method Detail

      • checkAgainstAllWords

        public int[] checkAgainstAllWords​(java.lang.String station)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Checks the chosen station against all stations in the file and tallies the count of words that have a hamming distance of 0, 1, 2, 3, pr 4 and puts those counts in their corresponding indices in the returned array (ie. the count of words with hamming distance 0 is placed at index 0 in the array)
        Parameters:
        staion - the stationID to be checked against all stationIDs in the list
        Returns:
        int[] array containing the counts of how many words have a hamming distance of 0, 1, 2, 3, or 4 with the given station. Index 0 represents the count of stations with hamming distance 0 with the given word, index 1 represents the count of stations with hamming distance 1 with the given word, etc.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getHammingDistance

        public int getHammingDistance​(java.lang.String str1,
                              java.lang.String str2)
        Calculates the haming distance between the two given station IDs
        Parameters:
        str1 - The first stationID to be compared
        str2 - The second stationID to be compared
        Returns:
        The hamming distance between the two given stationIDs

      • getStationList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getStationList​(java.lang.String stationID,
                                                            int target)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Generates a list of stationIDs that have a hamming distance of value 'target' with the given 'stationID'
        Parameters:
        stationID - The stationID to be compared to the list
        target - The hamming distance chosen on the JSlider that determines the stationIDs that are returned. Any stationIDs from the file that have a hamming distance of this value with the inputed stationID will be returned
        Returns:
        The stationIDs that have a hamming distance of 'target' with 'stationID'
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getAllStations

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllStations()
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a list of all stationIDs in the file.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all the stationIDs in the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
